entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
